mapper.select: SELECT task_id, task_list_id, title, deadline, estimate_min, description, period_day, is_today, is_completed, completed_date, display_order, today_order FROM task WHERE task_id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT currval(pg_get_serial_sequence('task', 'task_id'))
INSERT INTO task (task_list_id, title, deadline, estimate_min, description, period_day, is_today, is_completed, completed_date, display_order, today_order) VALUES (#{taskListId}, #{title}, #{deadline}, #{estimateMin}, #{description}, #{periodDay}, #{isToday}, #{isCompleted}, #{completedDate}, #{displayOrder}, #{todayOrder})
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET title = #{task.title}, task_list_id = #{task.taskListId}, deadline = #{task.deadline}, estimate_min = #{task.estimateMin}, description = #{task.description}, period_day = #{task.periodDay}, is_today = #{task.isToday} WHERE task_id = #{task.taskId} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM task_list tl WHERE tl.task_list_id = task.task_list_id AND tl.user_id = #{userId} )

UPDATE task SET is_completed = NOT is_completed, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, completed_date = CASE WHEN is_completed = true THEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ELSE NULL END WHERE task_id = #{taskId} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM task_list tl WHERE tl.task_list_id = task.task_list_id AND tl.user_id = #{userId} )
mapper.select: SELECT task_id, is_completed, completed_date from task where task_id = #{id}

SELECT t.task_id, t.title, t.deadline, t.estimate_min, t.is_today, t.period_day, t.description, t.is_completed, t.completed_date, tl.task_list_id, tl.name AS task_list_name -- DTO에 taskListName으로 매핑하기 위해 alias 사용 FROM task t JOIN task_list tl ON t.task_list_id = tl.task_list_id WHERE t.task_id = #{taskId} AND tl.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT t.task_id, t.title, t.deadline, t.estimate_min, t.is_today, t.period_day, t.description, t.is_completed, t.completed_date, tl.name AS task_list_name -- DTO에 taskListName으로 매핑하기 위해 alias 사용 FROM task t JOIN task_list tl ON t.task_list_id = tl.task_list_id AND tl.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.task_list_id, t.display_order

SELECT t.task_id, t.title, t.estimate_min, t.deadline, t.display_order, tl.name AS task_list_name FROM task t JOIN task_list tl ON t.task_list_id = tl.task_list_id WHERE t.is_today = false AND t.is_completed = false AND tl.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t.task_list_id, t.display_order

SELECT t.task_id, t.title, t.period_day, t.estimate_min, t.deadline, t.today_order, t.is_completed, tl.name AS task_list_name FROM task t JOIN task_list tl ON t.task_list_id = tl.task_list_id WHERE tl.user_id = #{userId} AND t.is_today = true AND ( t.is_completed = false OR ( t.is_completed = true AND t.completed_date >= CURRENT_DATE AND t.completed_date < CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '1 day' ) ) ORDER BY t.period_day, COALESCE(t.today_order, 2147483647), t.task_id
mapper.update: UPDATE task SET is_today = false, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, period_day = NULL WHERE task_id = #{taskId} AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM task_list tl WHERE tl.task_list_id = task.task_list_id AND tl.user_id = #{userId} )
